author: jdonnerstag
msg: Added Ajax support for bordered pages and components which implement IComponentResolver. The implementation is not perfect
though. What didn't work at all until now, still requires that component has been rendered once (full page
render), which however is usually true for ajax components. Replacing a (ajax) component should work as well.
